definitions.text: something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from its surroundings
examples: the gun in his pocket made an obvious bulge
he stood on the rocky prominence
the occipital protuberance was well developed
the bony excrescence between its horns
His stomach bulged after the huge meal

definitions.text: bulge out; form a bulge outward, or be so full as to appear to bulge
cause to bulge or swell outwards
